projects.title: Current America
projects.short: Discover How U.S. Electricity Generation Has Changed Over Time And Distance
projects.long: Current America is a data visualization project transforming hard to read information from the Energy Information Administration into an easy to understand application comparing changes in United States electricity generation over the last 25 years.
projects.build: Angular, MongoDB, D3.js, Charts.js and Datamaps.

projects.title: Alligator Jobs
projects.short: A job site for refugees, caseworkers and employers
projects.long: Alligator Jobs is a full-stack App designed to help refugees find work in America. Our application creates an easy to use platform and database for job seekers, their caseworkers and potential employers to connect easily in ways that erase the divide between different working cultures.
projects.build: Node.js/Express, PSQL, OAUTH2/Passport, GoogleAuth, Mocha/Chai, Pivotal Tracker, Heroku, Knex.JS, Bluebird (Promise Library), jQuery, Javascript, Bootstrap.

projects.title: Kyubot
projects.long: A web app that allows you to control an Orbotix Sphero robot directly from your Chrome browser.
projects.build: React, JavaScript, jQuery, PostCSS, Canvas, Sphero API and the Web Bluetooth API.

projects.title: Posner Poverty Hack
projects.short: Second-place finishing project for Posner Povery Hackathon
projects.long: Our team was one of nine assigned to three non-profit organizations. We worked with our partner NGO, Africa Agenda, to build a new strategy and replace an outdated Wordpress blog with a mockup of a future Angular powered site designed from scratch.
